details.attached-pkm-not-found:
Pkm not found in attached save.
If expected consider detach from save.
Otherwise check the save integrity.
details.is-duplicate: Copies of this pkm exists in save, "move attached" action won't be available.

storage.move.pkm-cannot-attached-already: Pkm {{name}} cannot be moved, he's already attached !
storage.move.attached-main-self: Move attached should target a save
storage.move.attached-save-self: Move attached should target main storage
storage.move.save-same-gen: Move should target saves with same generation ({{generation}})
storage.move.main-need-gen: Pkm {{name}} does not have pkm version for generation {{generation}}, create one before moving to save
storage.move.attached-multiple-versions: Pkm {{name}} cannot be moved with multiple versions to a save. Use "move attached", or remove all versions except one
storage.move.save-egg: Eggs cannot be moved outside save
storage.move.save-shadow: Shadow pkm cannot be moved outside save
storage.move.save-main-duplicate: Pkm {{name}} cannot be moved to main storage, a duplicate already exists
storage.box.delete.help: Box should be empty before delete it
storage.actions.move-attached-main.helpT: Move a linked copy of this pkm to the save
storage.actions.move-attached-main.helpC:
Move a copy to save, attached to stored pkm.
An attached pkm synchronizes its data from save with source stored pkm: exp, level, EVs, moves, nickname.
This allows to use the same pkm later in another save even if it's not the same generation
storage.actions.move-attached-save.helpT: Move a linked copy of this pkm to the storage
storage.actions.move-attached-save.helpC:
Move a copy to storage, attached to save pkm.
An attached pkm synchronizes its data from save with source stored pkm: exp, level, EVs, moves, nickname.
This allows to use the same pkm later in another save even if it's not the same generation
storage.actions.create-version.helpTitle: Create a version of this pkm for the generation {{generation}}
storage.actions.create-version.helpConte:
Create a copy compatible with save.
It allows to use pkm which may be not-compatible with any generation.
All versions shares same exp, level, EVs, but each one handles its own moves.
storage.actions.go-main.helpTitle: An attached version is present in a save
storage.actions.go-save.helpTitle: An attached version is present in stockage
storage.actions.detach-main.helpTitle: Detach pkm from attached one in save
storage.actions.detach-main.helpContent:
Break link between this pkm and the one in save (if exists).
Allows to use pkm in another save, and create new versions.
storage.actions.detach-save.helpTitle: Detach pkm from attached one in storage
storage.actions.detach-save.helpContent:
Break link between this pkm and the one in storage.
Allows to use pkm in another save, and create new versions.

storage.save-actions.title: {{count}} actions to save
storage.save-actions.help: Don't forget to save your changes !
storage.save-actions.type.create-pkm-ver: Create version for pkm {{name}} and generation {{generation}}
